title: Alita: Battle Angel
overview: From visionary filmmakers James Cameron (AVATAR) and Robert Rodriguez (SIN CITY), comes ALITA: BATTLE ANGEL, an epic adventure of hope and empowerment.

title: Dampyr
overview: Based on the popular comic book series, Dampyr follows Harlan Draka, a con artist. Harlan and his manager pretend to rid small villages of “vampires” haunting the town, accepting money for his fake services. When faced with defeating actual vampires, Harlan learns he is more than human and must use his newfound powers to destroy an evil Master of the Night.

title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
overview: Dracula falls for a mysterious and dangerous woman while taking a luxury cruise with the pack.

title: A Man Called Otto
overview: A grumpy widower forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbors that turns his world around.

title: Hotel Transylvania 2
overview: Dracula is worried that his half-human, half-vampire grandson isn't showing signs of being a vampire, and puts him in a monster-in-training boot camp!

title: Mortal Kombat
overview: The original high-flying film version of the legendary video game about three fearless warriors out to stop a wicked sorcerer from world domination.

title: Arcane
overview: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

title: Outer Banks
overview: Lost treasure. Buried secrets. And people willing to kill for both. John B and his loyal crew of friends risk it all as they hunt for a fortune in gold.

title: The Last Night at Tremore Beach
The Diplomat
overview: Amid an international crisis, a US diplomat contends with her high-profile new job as ambassador to the UK and her turbulent marriage to a political star.

title: Breathless
overview: A passionate medical team is devoted to saving lives in a bustling public hospital where tensions — and romance — keep their pulses racing.

title: The Law According to Lidia Poët
overview: In this gripping period drama, Lidia Poët investigates murders while fighting to practice law. Inspired by the true story of Italy's first female lawyer.
